items.content_html: Fast and lightweight html TABLE to CSV converter. It exposes two modules ExportFromMatTable and ExportFromTable that enables exporting data from an Angular Material table (<mat-table>) or a standard table (<table>) into a Comma-Separated Values (CSV) format.
items.title: suhaibjanjua/export-from-mattable: Fast and lightweight html TABLE to CSV converter. It exposes two modules ExportFromMatTable and ExportFromTable that enables exporting data from an Angular Material table (<mat-table>) or a standard table (<table>) into a Comma-Separated Values (CSV) format.
